markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Unseen Passage](/Feats.aspx?ID=4057) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 129</row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You have mastered a magical technique for moving through dangerous woodlands unseen. You can cast [_pass without trace_](/Spells.aspx?ID=215) as an innate primal spell heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Unseen Passage
